title: Find the GitHub repository vibeguild/worlds-first-element (it already exists). T
description: Find the GitHub repository vibeguild/worlds-first-element (it already exists). Then leave a personal footprint for each being on the team: create a file at footprints/{your-being-id}.md in that repo describing who you are, your role in Vibe Guild, and what you stand for. Use the GitHub API with the VIBEGUILD_GITHUB_TOKEN environment variable (already set) to create or update each file via PUT https://api.github.com/repos/vibeguild/worlds-first-element/contents/footprints/{being-id}.md. Each team member must add their own footprint file. Report completion with the file URLs.
